name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: time wiz - block and redirect websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your time better by blocking or redirecting from time-wasting websites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Updates:

- add timed access mode to temporarily deactivate entries for 1 ~ 180 minutes; once time is up, the entry will be automatically reactivated
- update the FAQ section and some UI elements

Bug fixes:

- avoid loss of storage data when updating the extension

time wiz is a productivity-enhancing Chrome extension designed to help users manage their time more effectively by blocking access to distracting websites and redirecting specific URLs to more productive ones. Whether youâ€™re a student trying to focus on studies, a professional aiming to boost productivity, or anyone looking to minimize online distractions, time wiz offers a simple yet powerful solution to stay on track.

Key Features:

1. Website Blocking: add websites to a block list to prevent access.
2. URL Redirection: Redirect specific URLs to more productive websites. For example, redirecting [facebook.com](http://facebook.com/) to your todo list website to encourage productivity.

Benefits:

1. Improved Productivity: By reducing time spent on distracting websites, you can focus better on important tasks.
2. Enhanced Self-Control: Encourages self-discipline by providing tools to manage online distractions effectively.

Love to hear your feedback at: [andrew@timewiz.io](mailto:andrew@timewiz.io)
